sense.def:
To smash something
pomeni nekaj udariti, vreči ali spustiti na tla, tako da se razleti na veliko koščkov.

seg.quote: I nearly smashed the TV set.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
smashes
, pade na tla in se razleti na veliko koščkov.

seg.quote: A plate dropped from his fingers and smashed on the kitchen floor.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with or without
OBJ,
with
ADJUNCT

sense.def:
To smash through something
pomeni iti skozi nekaj tako, da tisto razbijemo.

seg.quote: The police smashed their way into eleven homes.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
smashes
ali
is smashed against something
, z veliko silo udari ob nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: The waves smashed onto the shore.
The sea smashed the boat against the rocks.

sense.def:
To smash something
pomeni nekaj, na primer politični sistem, namerno uničiti.

seg.quote: We are interested in transforming the system rather than smashing it.

sense.def:
Igra ali film je
a smash
ali
a smash hit
, kadar je zelo uspešen in priljubljen.

seg.quote: The show was a smash hit in London and New York.

sense.def:
To smash something up
pomeni nekaj popolnoma uničiti tako, da razpade na veliko koščkov.

seg.quote: He started smashing up all the furniture.
